Original: *gasp* You...! A-Are you here for the
request about the Snow Garden...?
Translation: *gasp* You...! A-Are you here for the
request about the Snow Garden...?

Original: [Color:5]Is that why you are here?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Is that why you are here?[Color:0]

Original: Oh! I... I'm sorry I was so quick to
judge. Please excuse me.
Translation: Oh! I... I'm sorry I was so quick to
judge. Please excuse me.

Original: Oh, I knew it! I just looked at you
and had a hunch that you would be
the ones!
[Page]
But enough introductions, let me get
right to the point. Are you all
familiar with the [Color:5]snow flowers[Color:0]?
Translation: Oh, I knew it! I just looked at you
and had a hunch that you would be
the ones!
[Page]
But enough introductions, let me get
right to the point. Are you all
familiar with the [Color:5]snow flowers[Color:0]?

Original: [Color:5]Do you know of them?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you know of them?[Color:0]

Original: Oh... so you don't know about them.
Sorry... It's a rare flower that only
blooms in that silvery white land.
Translation: Oh... so you don't know about them.
Sorry... It's a rare flower that only
blooms in that silvery white land.

Original: Oh, I knew it! I had a hunch you guys
would know what I was talking about.
I just felt so sure all of a sudden!
Translation: Oh, I knew it! I had a hunch you guys
would know what I was talking about.
I just felt so sure all of a sudden!

Original: The snow flowers were seen recently
in the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0] while it was
being explored.
[Page]
That's right! It's literally a [Color:5]Snow
Garden[Color:0]! You know I'm an artist, right?
I want to capture it in a painting!
[Page]
From what I heard, the garden is in
the [Color:5]northwest area[Color:0] of the Sacred
Mountains. Yes, that's all I know...
[Page]
But it would be great if you could
find where it is and tell me! Can I
request that of you?
Translation: The snow flowers were seen recently
in the [Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0] while it was
being explored.
[Page]
That's right! It's literally a [Color:5]Snow
Garden[Color:0]! You know I'm an artist, right?
I want to capture it in a painting!
[Page]
From what I heard, the garden is in
the [Color:5]northwest area[Color:0] of the Sacred
Mountains. Yes, that's all I know...
[Page]
But it would be great if you could
find where it is and tell me! Can I
request that of you?

Original: [Color:5]Accept her request?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Accept her request?[Color:0]

Original: Oh! Is there anything I can do to
change your minds!?
Translation: Oh! Is there anything I can do to
change your minds!?

Original: Ah, just as I thought! I had a funny
feeling you would accept. It just...
came to me all of a sudden.
[Page]
But oh, if you know where it is
already, it's okay if you just tell
me now. Thanks!
Translation: Ah, just as I thought! I had a funny
feeling you would accept. It just...
came to me all of a sudden.
[Page]
But oh, if you know where it is
already, it's okay if you just tell
me now. Thanks!

Original: Oh, um... is there something you need
from me?
Translation: Oh, um... is there something you need
from me?

Original: [Color:5]Do you need something from her?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you need something from her?[Color:0]

Original: Oh! Sorry, I can be so quick to judge.
You spoke to me, so I thought...
Translation: Oh! Sorry, I can be so quick to judge.
You spoke to me, so I thought...

Original: Aha! I knew it. It was strange, I just
all of a sudden had a hunch that you'd
have some business with me.
[Page]
So, how can I be of service?
Translation: Aha! I knew it. It was strange, I just
all of a sudden had a hunch that you'd
have some business with me.
[Page]
So, how can I be of service?

Original: [Color:5]How will you respond?[Color:0]
I found the Snow Garden
I don't need anything
I need more information
Translation: [Color:5]How will you respond?[Color:0]
I found the Snow Garden
I don't need anything
I need more information

Original: Ummm, all I've heard is that it was
seen in the [Color:5]northwest area[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0].
[Page]
Although I did hear something about it
[Color:5]attracting birds or fish[Color:0]... I wonder
how that applies to the Snow Garden.
[Page]
And of course, the snow flowers shine
when the sunlight hits them, so you'll
only find it during the [Color:5]day[Color:0].
Translation: Ummm, all I've heard is that it was
seen in the [Color:5]northwest area[Color:0] of the
[Color:5]Sacred Mountains[Color:0].
[Page]
Although I did hear something about it
[Color:5]attracting birds or fish[Color:0]... I wonder
how that applies to the Snow Garden.
[Page]
And of course, the snow flowers shine
when the sunlight hits them, so you'll
only find it during the [Color:5]day[Color:0].

Original: Is... Is that true!?
Translation: Is... Is that true!?

Original: [Color:5]Is it true?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Is it true?[Color:0]

Original: Oh! My hopes... dashed... My racing
heart feels so empty now...
Translation: Oh! My hopes... dashed... My racing
heart feels so empty now...

Original: Ah, I thought so! I just had this
hunch you'd found it. It was the
oddest thing!
[Page]
But quick, point it out to me on
your map!
Translation: Ah, I thought so! I just had this
hunch you'd found it. It was the
oddest thing!
[Page]
But quick, point it out to me on
your map!

Original: A-All right! Got it! I'll go look for
it right away!
Translation: A-All right! Got it! I'll go look for
it right away!

Original: I-It was there! The Snow Garden was
right where you said!
[Page]
Snow flowers are rare because water
can only harden into that crystal
shape in places where the air is thin.
[Page]
For that many flowers to "bloom"
in one place... it just proves how
amazing the Sacred Mountains are!
[Page]
There were monsters all around it, so
there was no good way to capture its
beauty, but...
[Page]
I was happy just to see it for myself!
I already dropped off the reward, so
you can go accept it whenever!
Translation: I-It was there! The Snow Garden was
right where you said!
[Page]
Snow flowers are rare because water
can only harden into that crystal
shape in places where the air is thin.
[Page]
For that many flowers to "bloom"
in one place... it just proves how
amazing the Sacred Mountains are!
[Page]
There were monsters all around it, so
there was no good way to capture its
beauty, but...
[Page]
I was happy just to see it for myself!
I already dropped off the reward, so
you can go accept it whenever!

Original: I just got back... Do you think I
found the Snow Garden?
Translation: I just got back... Do you think I
found the Snow Garden?

Original: [Color:5]Do you think she found it?[Color:0]
Translation: [Color:5]Do you think she found it?[Color:0]

Original: Well, I didn't! It wasn't there! Not
a single trace of it! Just monsters!
I almost died!
Translation: Well, I didn't! It wasn't there! Not
a single trace of it! Just monsters!
I almost died!

Original: No!? You didn't think I'd find it
there? I don't understand. So you
were fooling me all along!?
Translation: No!? You didn't think I'd find it
there? I don't understand. So you
were fooling me all along!?

Original: Ah! I'm about to pass out from the
shock! You promised me you'd find
the garden...!
Translation: Ah! I'm about to pass out from the
shock! You promised me you'd find
the garden...!

Original: Thanks to all of you, I've seen a
miracle of nature with my own eyes.
You're the best!
[Page]
Now please accept the reward I left
with the bartender.
Translation: Thanks to all of you, I've seen a
miracle of nature with my own eyes.
You're the best!
[Page]
Now please accept the reward I left
with the bartender.
